name: Run, Dice, Run !!!
description:
You are Mr. Dice, and you have to run - Made during the GMTK Jam

This is a platformer where you can jump and you can do a double jump, which will be stronger if your dice have a high number. It's not as simple as it seems.

So your dice show 1, you make a little jump, your dice is on the 6, nothing can stop you now.

Font is KiwiSoda by Jeti :

https://www.dafont.com/fr/kiwisoda.font?l[]=10

Some sprites from :

https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/

https://essssam.itch.io/rocky-roads

Musics from :

https://opengameart.org/users/subspaceaudio

Have fun !
